Our lamahatta druk homestay's roadway house, its on the side roadway facing towards the pine forest
Our lamahatta homestay second house, its on the opposite side of the main roadway house, decorated with many flowers
A humble room of our lamahatta druk homestay, its on the roadside with a peaceful view of lamahatta pine forest
Decent size bathroom of our lamahatta druk homestay, it has a western toilet, shower and geyser or water heater
A relatively big room with confortable sofas, bed and wodden tibetan table of our Druk Home Stay
Bedroom with one big and small beds, from here you can go to the balcony for a fresh view of himalayas from lamahatta
Relatively large size bathroom of our lamahatta druk homestay, it has a western toilet, shower and geyser or water heater
A humble room of our lamahatta druk homestay, but from its balcony one can watch the refresing view of himalayas and darjeeling mountains
Azure colour bathroom of our lamahatta druk homestay, it has a western toilet, shower and geyser or water heater
Our lamahatta druk homestay's lower house, its downwards from the roadside towards the peaceful nature, if fated one can even find deer here, else there are many whistling birds to hear and see
